About Me

About Me

I am a Front-End Developer with a focus on making web applications that will benefit a persons lifestyle. While attending my coding bootcamp, General Assembly, I created two projects with this focus in mind. Since graduating, I've been focusing on my web design skills such as responsive design and CSS. I have also been working on improving the front-end skills I already have, while also learning new ones.

Fitness-Journal

Fitness-Journal is a Front-End Project. It was bulit using HTML, Materialize.css, and JavaScript. I used localStorage to persist the data. This web app allows users to track caloires from Meals and from workouts.

Front-End Repo

Get Up

This Full-Stack project allows users to keep track of the exercises they have completed. The web application includes CRUD actions and user authencation. The Back-End was built using Ruby on Rails, and the Front-End was built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and some Handlebar.js.

Front-End Repo Back-End Repo

Snow Doctors

Snow Doctors is a fictional copany that specializes in clearing parking lots and driveways. This was a project to test my Web Design skills. This site was made using HTML and CSS. The site is also responsive.

Front-End Repo

Quiz Game

This is a 10 question quiz game. This application was meant to test my skills with JavaScript mainly. User can answer each question, nad once they submit their answers, they will get the results at the end. User can also decide to restart game if they want to.
